entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023
